item.title: Trump’s Treasury pick is Scott Bessent. He’s said it’s absurd to fear ‘Trump-flation.’
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump has selected hedge-fund manager Scott Bessent to serve as secretary of the Treasury Department.

item.title: Nvidia continues its march to a $4 trillion stock-market valuation. Why it’s inevitable.
item.description: Two big questions: How does the tech giant grow fast enough to satisfy Wall Street — and how long will that take?
